interest: Printmedia & DrawingContemporary Practices in Art & DesignInterdisciplinary Practice-Led ResearchScience and Technology
ANU.biography: Notably, Erica's work 'Metamorphosis' 2016, won the 2018 Waterhouse Natural Science Art prize; In 2017 Erica was awarded the Capital Arts Patrons Fellowship, and in 2015 her work, 'Virtual Life' 2014 won the Inaugural Paramor Prize: Art + Innovation Casula Powerhouse Art Centre, Liverpool, NSW
